citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 pm on
November 02, 2022.
Called all the contact numbers provided and waited 30 mins with no response.
Additional Inspectors:
Tracie Guy, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
